caption:
We've kept you guessing long enough! The time has come to drop anchor and reveal all.

Ta daaa… our NEW Extra Strength Deodorant scent is called… ‘DRIFT’ 🌊

With aromas of sea salt, melon & cypress, Drift may just be our best scent yet. 

Drift is all about “less is more”. It’s subtle. It’s relaxing. It’s oh-so-summery. 

Inspired by clear blue waters, balmy skies and the salty sea breeze, Drift is a treat for your pits AND your nose.

Here’s why you’ll ❤️ it
- Smells like sea salt, melon & cypress (soft & subtle).
- It’s unisex & suits just about everyone.
- Extra-strength protection keeps you fresh & BO-free all day.
- It’s bicarb-free making it gentle on your skin.
- It features our NEW super-smooth, extra-creamy, easy-glide formula.
- As always, 100% natural, vegan & cruelty-free.
 
Now that the secret's out, why not dive in and give it a try? 

Shop Drift at woohoobody.com.au today and score yourself:
🌈 free natural deodorant with orders over $50
🌈 free express shipping with orders over $75
